content.json:
## Network Traffic Insights Workbook (Preview)
---
Information in the dashboard is based on log data

parameters.name: LogAnalyticWorkspace
parameters.label: Log Analytic Workspace
parameters.description: The Log Analytic Workspace In Which To Execute The Queries

parameters.name: Users
parameters.query:
NetworkAccessTraffic
| summarize Count = count() by UserPrincipalName
| order by Count desc, UserPrincipalName asc
| project Value = UserPrincipalName, Label = strcat(UserPrincipalName, ' - ', Count, ' Logs'), Selected = false

parameters.name: WebCategories
parameters.label: Web Categories
parameters.query:
NetworkAccessTraffic
| extend firstCategory = tostring(split(DestinationWebCategories, ',')[0]) // Split and get the first category
| summarize Count = count() by firstCategory
| order by Count desc, firstCategory asc
| project Value = firstCategory, Label = strcat(firstCategory, ' - ', Count, ' Logs')

content.query:
let NetworkAccessTrafficData = NetworkAccessTraffic
| where SourceIp != "" and isnotempty(SourceIp)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by SourceIp, TenantId;

let SigninLogsData = SigninLogs
| where IPAddress != "" and isnotempty(IPAddress)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IPAddress, TenantId, UserId, CorrelationId;

SigninLogsData
| join kind=leftanti (
    NetworkAccessTrafficData
    | where SourceIp != "" and isnotempty(SourceIp)
) on $left.IPAddress == $right.SourceIp and $left.TenantId == $right.TenantId
| project TimeGenerated, IPAddress, UserId, UserPrincipalName, AppDisplayName, DeviceDetail.deviceId
content.title: Sign-ins Outside Global Secure Access

content.json: ðŸ’¡ Type the URL for detailed analysis

content.query:
let CategoryData = NetworkAccessTraffic 
| where DestinationFqdn contains "{URL}"  // Filters logs based on the provided URL parameter
| extend CategoriesList = split(DestinationWebCategories, ",")  // Split categories into a list
| mv-expand Category = CategoriesList  // Expand the list into individual rows
| extend Category = trim_start(" ", trim_end(" ", tostring(Category)))  // Trim leading and trailing spaces
| extend Category = iff(TrafficType == "microsoft365", "Microsoft M365", Category)  // Set category to "Microsoft M365" if TrafficType is "microsoft365"
| summarize UniqueCategories = make_set(Category);  // Create a set of unique categories

CategoryData
| extend 
    PrimaryCategory = iff(array_length(UniqueCategories) > 0, tostring(UniqueCategories[0]), "None")
| project 
    col1 = PrimaryCategory,
    snapshot = "Primary Category"

| union (
    CategoryData
    | extend 
        SecondaryCategory = iff(array_length(UniqueCategories) > 1, tostring(UniqueCategories[1]), "None")
    | project 
        col1 = SecondaryCategory,
        snapshot = "Secondary Category"
)

| order by snapshot asc

let NetworkData = NetworkAccessTraffic
| where DestinationFqdn contains "{URL}";  // Filters logs based on the provided URL parameter

NetworkData
| summarize 
    UniqueUsers = dcount(UserPrincipalName),
    UniqueDevices = dcount(DeviceId),    
    TotalAllow = countif(Action == "Allow"),
    TotalBlock = countif(Action == "Block")
| project 
    col1 = UniqueUsers, 
    snapshot = "Unique Users"
| union (NetworkData
    | summarize UniqueDevices = dcount(DeviceId)
    | project col1 = UniqueDevices, snapshot = "Unique Devices")
| union (NetworkData
    | summarize TotalAllow = countif(Action == "Allow")
    | project col1 = TotalAllow, snapshot = "Total Allow")
| union (NetworkData
    | summarize TotalBlock = countif(Action == "Block")
    | project col1 = TotalBlock, snapshot = "Total Block")
| order by snapshot asc

let NetworkData = NetworkAccessTraffic
| where DestinationFqdn contains "{URL}";  // Filters logs based on the provided URL parameter

NetworkData
| summarize 
    TotalSent = sum(SentBytes),
    TotalReceived = sum(ReceivedBytes),
    TotalBandwidth = sum(SentBytes + ReceivedBytes)
| extend 
    TotalSentMB = round(TotalSent / 1024.0 / 1024.0, 2),
    TotalReceivedMB = round(TotalReceived / 1024.0 / 1024.0, 2),
    TotalBandwidthMB = round(TotalBandwidth / 1024.0 / 1024.0, 2)
| project 
    TotalSentMB,
    TotalReceivedMB,
    TotalBandwidthMB
| extend dummy = 1
| project-away dummy
| mv-expand 
    Column = pack_array("TotalSentMB", "TotalReceivedMB", "TotalBandwidthMB"),
    Value = pack_array(TotalSentMB, TotalReceivedMB, TotalBandwidthMB)
| extend 
    snapshot = case(
        Column == "TotalSentMB", "Total Sent (MB)",
        Column == "TotalReceivedMB", "Total Received (MB)",
        Column == "TotalBandwidthMB", "Total Bandwidth (MB)",
        "Unknown"
    ),
    col1 = iff(Value < 0.01, 0.00, Value)
| project-away Column, Value
| order by snapshot asc

NetworkAccessTraffic
| where UserPrincipalName in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| where DestinationWebCategories in ({WebCategories}) or '*' in ({WebCategories})
| where DestinationFqdn contains "{URL}"
| project 
    Timestamp = TimeGenerated,
    User = UserPrincipalName,
    ["Source IP"] = SourceIp,
    ["Destination IP"] = DestinationIp,
    ["Destination Port"] = DestinationPort,
    ["Destination FQDN"] = DestinationFqdn,
    Action = case(
        tolower(Action) == "allow", "ðŸŸ¢ Allow", 
        tolower(Action) == "block", "ðŸ”´ Block", 
        tolower(Action) // This returns the action in lowercase if it doesn't match "allow" or "block"
    ),
    ["Policy Name"] = PolicyName,
    ["Policy Rule ID"] = PolicyRuleId,
    ["Received Bytes"] = ReceivedBytes,
    ["Sent Bytes"] = SentBytes,
    ["Device OS"] = DeviceOperatingSystem    
| order by Timestamp desc

NetworkAccessTraffic
| where UserPrincipalName in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| where DestinationWebCategories in ({WebCategories}) or '*' in ({WebCategories})
| project 
    Timestamp = TimeGenerated,
    User = UserPrincipalName,
    ["Source IP"] = SourceIp,
    ["Destination IP"] = DestinationIp,
    ["Destination Port"] = DestinationPort,
    ["Destination FQDN"] = DestinationFqdn,
    Action = case(
        tolower(Action) == "allow", "ðŸŸ¢ Allow", 
        tolower(Action) == "block", "ðŸ”´ Block", 
        tolower(Action) // This returns the action in lowercase if it doesn't match "allow" or "block"
    ),
    ["Policy Name"] = PolicyName,
    ["Web Category"] = DestinationWebCategories,
    ["Transport Protocol"] = TransportProtocol,
    ["Traffic Type"] = TrafficType,
    ["Received Bytes"] = ReceivedBytes,
    ["Sent Bytes"] = SentBytes,
    ["Device OS"] = DeviceOperatingSystem,
    ["Policy Rule ID"] = PolicyRuleId
| order by Timestamp desc
content.title: Traffic Logs

content.query:
// Unique Users
NetworkAccessTraffic
| where UserPrincipalName in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| where DestinationWebCategories in ({WebCategories}) or '*' in ({WebCategories})
| extend GeoInfo = geo_info_from_ip_address(SourceIp) // Extend each row with geolocation info
| project SourceIp, Country = tostring(GeoInfo.country), State = tostring(GeoInfo.state), City = tostring(GeoInfo.city), Latitude = tostring(GeoInfo.latitude), Longitude = tostring(GeoInfo.longitude)
| summarize UniqueUsers=dcount(Country)
| extend snapshot = "Total Locations"
| project col1 = UniqueUsers, snapshot

// Union with Unique Devices
| union (
    NetworkAccessTraffic
    | where UserPrincipalName in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
    | extend BytesInGB = todouble(SentBytes + ReceivedBytes) / (1024 * 1024 * 1024)  // Convert bytes to gigabytes
    | summarize TotalBytesGB = sum(BytesInGB)
    | extend snapshot = "Total Bytes (GB)"
    | project col1 =   tolong(TotalBytesGB), snapshot
)

// Union with Total Internet Access
| union (
    NetworkAccessTraffic
    | where UserPrincipalName in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
    | summarize TotalTransactions = count()
    | extend snapshot = "Total Transactions"
    | project col1 = TotalTransactions, snapshot
)

// Union with Total Private Access
// Order by Snapshot for consistent tile ordering on dashboard
| order by snapshot

NetworkAccessTraffic
| where UserPrincipalName in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| where DestinationWebCategories in ({WebCategories}) or '*' in ({WebCategories})
| extend BytesIn = todouble(SentBytes + ReceivedBytes) / (1024 * 1024)  // Convert bytes to Mbytes
| summarize TotalBytesMB = sum(BytesIn) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), TrafficType
| order by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h) asc, TrafficType asc
| project TimeGenerated, TrafficType, TotalBytesMB
content.title: Usage Over Time (MB)

content.query:
NetworkAccessTraffic
| where UserPrincipalName in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| where DestinationWebCategories in ({WebCategories}) or '*' in ({WebCategories})
| extend GeoInfo = geo_info_from_ip_address(SourceIp) // Extend each row with geolocation info
| project  TimeGenerated, SourceIp, Country = tostring(GeoInfo.country), State = tostring(GeoInfo.state), City = tostring(GeoInfo.city), Latitude = tostring(GeoInfo.latitude), Longitude = tostring(GeoInfo.longitude)
| where Country != ""
| summarize Count = count() by City, State, Country
content.title: Locations

content.query:
NetworkAccessTraffic
| where UserPrincipalName in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| where DestinationWebCategories in ({WebCategories}) or '*' in ({WebCategories})
| where tolower(Action) == "allow" and DestinationWebCategories != '' // Filter for allowed traffic
| where DestinationWebCategories in ({WebCategories}) or '*' in ({WebCategories})
| extend firstCategory = tostring(split(DestinationWebCategories, ',')[0]) // Split and get the first category
| summarize Count = count() by firstCategory
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top Allowed Web Categories

content.query:
NetworkAccessTraffic
| where UserPrincipalName in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| where DestinationWebCategories in ({WebCategories}) or '*' in ({WebCategories})
| where tolower(Action) == "block" and DestinationWebCategories != '' // Filter for blocked traffic
| extend firstCategory = tostring(split(DestinationWebCategories, ',')[0]) // Split and get the first category
| summarize Count = count() by firstCategory
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top Blocked Web Categories

content.query:
NetworkAccessTraffic  
| where UserPrincipalName in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| where DestinationWebCategories in ({WebCategories}) or '*' in ({WebCategories})
| where tolower(Action) == "block" and DestinationFqdn != ''  // Filter for blocked traffic with non-empty Destination FQDN
| summarize Count = count() by ["Destination FQDN"] = DestinationFqdn, ["Destination Web Categories"] = DestinationWebCategories, ["Policy Name"] = PolicyName
| order by Count
content.title: Top Blocked Destinations

content.query:
NetworkAccessTraffic
| where UserPrincipalName in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| where DestinationWebCategories in ({WebCategories}) or '*' in ({WebCategories})
| where SentBytes > 0
| where tolower(Action) != "block"
| summarize 
    Count = count(), 
    ["Sent Bytes"] = sum(SentBytes), 
    ["Received Bytes"] = sum(ReceivedBytes), 
    ["Total Bytes"] = sum(ReceivedBytes + SentBytes) 
    by ["Destination FQDN"] = DestinationFqdn
| order by Count desc
content.title: Top Allowed Destinations

content.query:
NetworkAccessTraffic
| where UserPrincipalName in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| where TransportProtocol != ''
| summarize Count = count() by toupper(TransportProtocol)
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Protocol Distribution
